participant_1.name: Elena
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys writing and has a passion for fantasy.
participant_1.background: I want to live in a place with a better climate for my skin. I made many memories with my family last year. I love dragons. We have two small dogs. My father used to be an insurance salesman.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, loves animals and is pursuing entrepreneurial ventures.
participant_2.background: I love my cat, he's always there to greet me after a workout. Both my parents are creative. I am currently trying to open my own grocery store. I watch Jimmy Fallon's show every night. I go to at least 10 concerts a year.

content.text: Not bad, just got done with a workout.
Nice! I like to work out, but I'm not very good at it.
You just gotta keep at it. I love my cat, he's always there to greet me after a workout.
That's awesome! I love cats. I have two small dogs.
Aww, I love dogs too. I'm trying to open my own grocery store.
That's really cool! I'm in the process of trying to change careers.
What are you trying to change to?
I want to be a writer.
That's a great career! I love to read.
Me too! I love to read fantasy books.
I love fantasy books too! I'm a big fan of Game of Thrones.
Me too! I love that show.
It's so good! I'm so excited for the new season.
Me too! I'm not sure if I'm ready for it to end.
Me neither. It's going to be so sad.
But it's been a great run.
It has! I'm going to miss it.
